SELECT Product.*, pAttach.aNo, pAttach.aOriginName FROM Product LEFT JOIN pAttach ON Product.pNo = pAttach.pNo WHERE 1 = 1
AND Product.pNo like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND Product.pName like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
order by Product.pNo asc limit #{pPage},#{perPageNum}

select count(*) as cnt from product

where pName like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Product (pType, pName, pPrice, pInput, pOutput, pStock, pDate) VALUES (#{pType}, #{pName}, #{pPrice}, #{pInput}, #{pOutput}, #{pInput}, NOW());
